name: keep-texts-in-tabs
description: Keep texts in Home Assistant dashboards tabs when icons are added to them
author: ElChiniNet

scripts.test:all: pnpm test:ts && pnpm test:lint && pnpm test:ci
scripts.test:ci: pnpm test:clean && pnpm demo && pnpm start:playwright && pnpm stop:ha
scripts.test:tag: pnpm reset:ha && pnpm test:clean && pnpm demo && pnpm tag:playwright && pnpm stop:ha
scripts.start:playwright: docker run --rm --network host --add-host host.docker.internal:host-gateway -v $(pwd):/$(pwd)/ -w $(pwd) -i mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v$(jq -r '.devDependencies["@playwright/test"]' package.json)-jammy sh -c "yarn test:run && exit"
scripts.tag:playwright: docker run --rm --network host --add-host host.docker.internal:host-gateway -v $(pwd):/$(pwd)/ -w $(pwd) -i mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v$(jq -r '.devDependencies["@playwright/test"]' package.json)-jammy sh -c "npx playwright test --grep @testing"
